m_szDocTitle: How Will Ford (F) Stock React To New Hybrid to Compete Against Toyota's (TM) Prius? - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet How Will Ford (F) Stock React To New Hybrid to Compete Against Toyota's (TM) Prius? By Tedd Cohen | 08/20/14 - 05:01 PM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Ford Motor Co. ( F - Get Report )  plans to introduce a new hybrid gasoline-electric car in late 2018 to compete against Toyota's ( TM - Get Report ) Prius, sources told Reuters. The as-yet-unnamed compact car will be Ford's first "dedicated" hybrid and will be built outside of Detroit, sources said.   Shares of Ford closed slightly higher at $17.41, and are flat in after-hours trading.
